sentences.sentence: Thy skill to poet were, thou Scorner of the ground!
sentences.translation: 这就是鄙弃尘土的你啊，你的艺术技巧！

sentences.sentence: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.
sentences.translation: 亵慢人不爱受责备。 他也不就近智慧人。

sentences.sentence: Reprove not a scorner, lest he hate you: rebuke a wise man, and he will love you.
sentences.translation: 不要责备亵慢人，恐怕他恨你；要责备智慧人，他必爱你。
